metadata.title: CVE-2017-7401 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect interaction of the parse_packet() and parse_part_sign_sha256()functions in network.c in collectd 5.7.1 and earlier allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) of a collectdinstance (configured with "SecurityLevel None" and with empty "AuthFile"options) via a crafted UDP packet.

criterions.comment: collectd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
